title: doc: golang.org is not showing gopher images
body:
http://golang.org/doc/gopher shows nothing, although they are visible in
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse#hg%2Fdoc%2Fgopher

Ditto for tip.golang.org

I believe they were shown before. They appear in a local godoc. Is it just that we don't
include them on the web site?

If this is a long-standing or difficult issue you know about, downgrade from Go 1.1 and
we can talk about it later. But if it's just an oversight in pushing the package, let's
fix it.
